name: Sweet Potato and Carrot Tinga Tacos
description: Sweet potato and carrot tinga tacos are a bit sweet, the chipotle-tomato sauce adds a tanginess and spiciness that will keep you coming back.

video.name: Sweet Potato Carrot Tinga Tacos
video.description: Sweet Potato and Carrot Tinga Tacos simmered in a tomato chipotle sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauté pan over medium-heat, add water and onion, cook for 3 -4 minutes, until the onion is translucent and soft. Add the garlic and continue to cook, stirring for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large sauté pan over medium-heat, add water and onion, cook for 3 -4 minutes, until the onion is translucent and soft. Add the garlic and continue to cook, stirring for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sweet potato and carrot to the pan and cook for 5 min stirring often.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sweet potato and carrot to the pan and cook for 5 min stirring often.

itemListElement.text: Place the diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, oregano, and chipotle peppers in the blender and process until smooth.
itemListElement.name: Place the diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, oregano, and chipotle peppers in the blender and process until smooth.

itemListElement.text: Add chipotle-tomato sauce to the pan and cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sweet potatoes and carrot are cooked through. If necessary add more vegetable stock to the pan.
itemListElement.name: Add chipotle-tomato sauce to the pan and cook for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sweet potatoes and carrot are cooked through. If necessary add more vegetable stock to the pan.

itemListElement.text: Serve on warm tortillas and top with avocado slices.
itemListElement.name: Serve on warm tortillas and top with avocado slices.

keywords: carrot tinga, vegan mexican recipes, vegan tacos
